content.rendered:
In another step towards solidifying the longstanding partnership, Danfoss presented TTE with the Performance Award for 2022 and Premium Partner Certificate, 2023 as part of their Partner Excellence Programme. Danfoss was represented by Kjell H. Stroem, Emre GÖREN, Jai Masand and Sohaib Sulaiman. The award was received by Dilip Sharma and Roshan Samuel.

Representatives of both companies shared their common goal of being the preferred decarbonization partner for the UAE, thereby contributing towards UAE 2050 energy goals.

Since 1989, TTE has been the distributor for Danfoss Refrigeration & Air Conditioning Controls and Industrial Automation products in Dubai and the Northern Emirates. It is also one of the authorized distributors / re-sellers for many other Danfoss products in the UAE.
